subject: Athletics and Sports
lead_paragraph: Omar Minaya’s checklist for this week’s winter meetings, and perhaps beyond, looks something like this: Pitching. Pitching. Pitching. Relief pitching. Starting pitching. Still, more pitching.
snippet: Omar Minaya’s checklist for this week’s winter meetings, and perhaps beyond, looks something like this: Pitching. Pitching. Pitching. Relief pitching. Starting pitching. Still, more pitching.
